bug.author: lokeshsoni
bug.description: Please update the flowers code to support all the latest libraries! The code when run in the same environment as prescribed throws an error on DataFlow console.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lokeshsoni>@lokeshsoni</denchmark-link> thanks for contacting us, we will be updating our examples in the next coming weeks. I will update this thread once is completed. In the meantime, please take a look at existing issues, the error you report may be already reported <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloudml-samples/pull/246>before</denchmark-link> . (Update Apache Beam version to 2.6.0)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/lokeshsoni>@lokeshsoni</denchmark-link> The pipeline was updated, code should run now. Can you please try it? We will be updating this to a more recent version of TF (1.10+)
I submitted a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloudml-samples/pull/312>#312</denchmark-link> which updates to latest CMLE supported version: 1.10
